name: PCCompat
author: Strencher
description: Allows you to load powerCord plugins within Kernel.

changelog.title: Added
items: Added a `electron.remote` API back from when contextIsolation wasn't a thing. This gives plugins more flexibility.
Added developer mode and now stuff that's still under development is hidden behind that.
Added a little version tag into discord's settings.

changelog.title: Improved speed
items: The bundle is now minified to tweak loading speed and bundle size.
Users can now install only needed depdendencies using `pnpm initialize`. We recommend you to do this to speed up loading and remove development dependencies.

changelog.title: Fixes
items: Fixed some logging errors due to a replaced logger module.
Fixed a few plugins that depend on `powercord/constants` to have `SETTINGS_FOLDER` as a path.
Fixed the `buffer` module entirely. Should now be exposed properly.
Fixed node globalPaths for pnpm installations.
Fixed some electron API related stuff.
